doc:
Mark Stevens (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Stevens_(actor) 0 Mark Stevens (born Richard William Stevens, December 13, 1916 – September 15, 1994) was an American actor, one of four who played the lead role in the television series, Martin Kane, Private Eye, which aired on NBC from 1949 to 1954. Mark_Stevens ( born Richard_William_Stevens , December_13_,_1916 – September_15_,_1994 ) was an_American_actor , one of four who played the_lead_role in the_television_series , Martin_Kane , Private_Eye , which aired on NBC from 1949 to 1954 .
